amendment.description: To extend the authorization of the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3944 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3944 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S10192; text: CR S10192) To extend the authorization of the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3944 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3944 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
